description: This file defines function prototypes related to time conversion operations, including converting local time to UTC, UTC to local, and splitting block days. It also contains include guards and licensing information.

methods.name: getOffset
methods.description: Returns the timezone offset as a time_t value.

methods.name: ConvLocalToUTC
methods.description: Converts local time string to UTC time string.

methods.name: ConvUTCToLocal
methods.description: Converts UTC time string to local time string.

methods.name: split_BlockDays
methods.description: Splits the start and end block days given string representations.
